CHAT.comment: Home Visit 1; took place in play room , Chi sat on chair from child's play set , MOT sat on another child's chair kitty-corner from Chi , early evening

u.a: shrugs her shoulder to indicate she does not know
Mother returns with telephone number to complete the interview
seven second pause while Mot flips through the book to the beginning
points at items in list from sausage to watermeIon and at caterpillar
aft looks at Chi after reading
MOT begins reading before Chi is paying attention to the book
Chi hands EXP a door knob hanging off Alf
Chi goes back to her seat at the table
aft closes book and waits for next task
